rooms.description: Large living area with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light; features minimalist decor and modern industrial design elements.
Home theater room with soundproof walls, dark finishes, integrated AV system and comfortable seating; designed for immersive viewing experiences.
Spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet and private ensuite bathroom. Designed to maximize relaxation and privacy.
Guest bedroom featuring modern amenities and storage solutions; includes a mini ensuite or shared bathroom option.
Open plan kitchen with industrial design elements including exposed brickwork and stainless steel fixtures. Functional layout for efficient cooking.
Dining area integrated with the living space for a seamless flow; designed to accommodate social gatherings.
Compact study or office area tailored to the bachelor pad concept; ideal for remote work and personal projects.
Additional storage space including built-in cabinets and closets designed to maximize utility within the limited area.

openings.description: Industrial style front door with glass accents, inviting yet secure entrance.
Service entry for efficient utility access and deliveries; designed to blend with the industrial aesthetic.
Balcony space integrated into the living area, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural lighting.
